header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.target:
Welcome %firstname%!
Thank you for joining our website. Your account is now active.
Your account on %sitename% has been created
All the best,
- Time range:

Congratulations! Your booking has been confirmed and your payment of %booking_amount_asker% has been accepted. Here are the booking details: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% You can contact %offerer_firstname% %offerer_lastname% on this page. You can download your invoice here.
Booking confirmation %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, The booking made by %asker_firstname% %asker_lastname% is now confirmed. Here are the booking details: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% Your wire transfer of %booking_amount_offerer% will be made on the following date: %offerer_wiretransfer_date% If you haven’t already done so, please enter your bank account details so we may wire you your money by clicking on this link. The cancellation policy you selected is the following: %cancellation_policy_title%: %cancellation_policy_description% You can contact %asker_firstname% %asker_lastname% on this page.
Your booking N°%booking_uid% has been confirmed

Hi %firstname%, You have made a new booking request to %offerer_name%. Here are the details of your booking request: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% - Price: %booking_amount_asker% You will only be charged if %offerer_name% accepts your request. This booking request will expire on %booking_request_expiry_date%.
Confirmation of your booking request %booking_uid%
Hi %firstname%, Your booking request has expired as we didn’t receive a confirmation in time. Nothing has been charged to you. Click here to view other listings to book from.
Your booking request has expired %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, The following reservation has expired: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% - Your earnings: %booking_amount_offerer% If you wish you can still contact %asker_name% here. Be aware that it is best that you do not let the requests expire as that has a negative impact on your position in the search results.
A reservation request has expired %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, You have a new booking request from %asker_name%. Here are the details: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% - Your earnings: %booking_amount_offerer% View this booking request to accept or decline it. Keep in mind that this booking request will expire on %booking_request_expiry_date%.
New booking request (%booking_amount_offerer% %booking_currency%) - (%booking_uid%)

Hi %firstname%, You have cancelled the following booking: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Reservation number: %booking_uid% The cancellation policy for this booking is the following: %cancellation_policy_title%: %cancellation_policy_description% In accordance to this, the reimbursement to be made to you is %asker_cancellation_amount%. When an amount has to be paid, wire transfers are made 4 business days after the cancellation. To receive your funds please provide your bank account details by clicking on this link.
You have cancelled your booking %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, The following reservation has been cancelled by %asker_firstname% %asker_lastname%: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Reservation number: %booking_uid% The cancellation policy you selected is the following: %cancellation_policy_title%: %cancellation_policy_description% In accordance to this, the outstanding payment to be made to you is %offerer_cancellation_amount%. When an amount has to be paid, wire transfers are made 4 business days after the cancellation.
%asker_name% has cancelled his booking %booking_uid%

Hello,
You have a new information request via the contact form: - First name: %first_name% - Last name: %last_name% - Email : %email% - Phone : %phone%
- Subject : %subject% - Message : %message%
Information request

Hi %firstname%, The following reservation is about to expire: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% - Your earnings: %booking_amount_offerer% - Expiry time: %booking_request_expiry_date% Be aware that it is best that you do not let the request expire as that will have a negative impact on your position in the search results. You can click on the following link to accept or reject the request.
A reservation request is about to expire %booking_amount_offerer% %booking_uid%
Hello %firstname%, Click on the following link to set a new password.
Password recovery

Hi %firstname%, This is a reminder that your booking will start soon. Here are the booking details: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% You can contact %offerer_firstname% %offerer_lastname% on this page.
Your booking tomorrow %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, This is a reminder that you have a booking tomorrow. Here are the booking details: - Listing: %listing_title% - Start date: %booking_start_date% - End date: %booking_end_date% %booking_time_range_title% %booking_time_range% - Duration: %booking_duration% You can contact %asker_firstname% %asker_lastname% on this page.
Your booking tomorrow %booking_uid%

Congratulations %firstname%! Your listing is now publicly visible. In order to push it to the top of the search results keep in mind the following: - Keep your calendar updated. A listing with a recently updated calendar will show higher up in the rankings. (update your calendar) - You have %default_booking_expiry_length% to either accept or refuse requests. If you let them expire you’ll get negative points and your listing will rank down. - Try to reply to messages quickly, faster response times are appreciated by users and provide a better ranking for your listing. You can view your public listing here
Your listing has been published
Hi %recipient_firstname%, You have received a message, click here to read it.
You have received a new message

Hi %firstname%, Unfortunately your payment for this reservation has been declined. As a result your request has been cancelled. You can try again by clicking on this link: %listing_public_url% You can contact %offerer_name% on this page.
Payment declined %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, Unfortunately the payment for this reservation has been declined.%asker_name% has been asked to try again. In that case you will receive a new reservation request. You can contact %asker_name% on this page.
Payment declined %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, Your booking request has been rejected. Although very rare, refusals do occur mainly as a result of out of date calendars. Nothing has been charged to you. Click here to view other listings to book from.
Your booking request has been rejected %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, You have turned down a reservation of %booking_amount_offerer%. We do our best to provide you with quality requests that match the availabilities and prices you have set. If you turned down this request because you were in fact unavailable then please update your calendar through this link. Updating your calendar frequently pushes your listing to the top of the search results. Don’t hesitate to let us know if there is anything we can do to make these requests match your requirements better.
You have turned down a reservation %booking_uid%

Hi %firstname%, By clicking on the following link you will be able to leave your review on %asker_name%. Leaving reviews greatly increases your ranking on our search engine as it indicates that you are an active member of our community.
Please review %asker_name% (%booking_uid%)

Hi %firstname%, We hope that the review system helped you when you made your booking. We encourage you to help others in the same way. By clicking on the following link. you will be able to leave your review on %offerer_name%.
Please review %offerer_name% (%booking_uid%)
The %sitename% team

Hi %firstname%, Updating your calendar will rank your listing up in the search results. In particular, you should specifically state the periods that are available (and not just leave them by default empty). You can click on the following link to update your calendar.
Rank up in our search results to get more bookings

Hi %firstname%, Your wiretransfer of %booking_amount_offerer% for booking %booking_uid% has been successfully executed. Please allow for a couple of days for the funds to appear in your account. You can view your payments: here
Your wiretransfer of %booking_amount_offerer% has been executed (booking_amount_offerer)
